resources.string: 1. The app works with popular music streaming services like Spotify, JioSaavn and Gaana.\n 2. Make sure you have enabled notification access for the app\n 3. The app needs to continue running in the background to work properly so turn off battery optimization in the app settings page.

1. SpotIt needs to continue running in the background to work properly
2. Your manufacturer might be killing apps in background.
3. Turn off battery optimization / background restrictions for SpotIt.
4. This setting is generally present in apps or battery settings.

1. The app does not collect any private data and does not use any network permissions.
 2. It uses user notifications just to detect advertisements in music streaming services.
 3. It does not alter or "hack" protection measures of music streaming services, and only gathers context information provided by the Android runtime.
 4. The app is open source and does not seek a commercial interest.
